Package org.ginsim.core.graph.view.style

Interface Style

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    EdgeStyle<V,​E>, NodeStyle<V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseStyle, BaseStyleOverride, DefaultDynamicEdgeStyle, DefaultDynamicNodeStyle, DefaultHTGNodeStyle, DefaultRegulatoryEdgeStyle, DefaultRegulatoryNodeStyle, DefaultTreeEdgeStyle, DefaultTreeNodeStyle, EdgeStyleImpl, EdgeStyleOverride, NodeStyleImpl, NodeStyleOverride
    public interface Style
    Define common methods for styles.
    Author:
    Aurelien Naldi

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getProperties

        StyleProperty[] getProperties()
        Retrieve all properties used by this style. The default set of properties matches visual properties, but each style can use a different set of properties. For example, the default style for edges in a regulatory graph has several properties for edge colors: positive, negative, dual.
        Returns:
        the list of properties used by this style.

      • getProperty

        Object getProperty​(StyleProperty prop)
        Retrieve the value of a property. This handles internal properties directly and should not be used to retrieve the resulting visual settings (use dedicated methods for that). This should be used to save properties, or for the style edition panel.
        Parameters:
        prop - the property to retrieve
        Returns:
        the value of the property, which can be null.

      • setProperty

        void setProperty​(StyleProperty prop,
                 Object value)
        Assign a value to a property. This handles internal properties directly. It should be used to restore them when loading a graph or for the style edition panel.
        Parameters:
        prop - the property to set
        value - the assigned value (can be null)

      • getName

        String getName()
        Name getter
        Returns:
        string name

      • setName

        void setName​(String name)
        Name setter
        Parameters:
        name - string name

      • getParentProperty

        Object getParentProperty​(StyleProperty property)
        Getter parent
        Parameters:
        property - style property
        Returns:
        object parent style property

      • getCSS

        String getCSS()
        define the style as CSS rules.
        Returns:
        a String with the CSS rules

      • copy

        void copy​(Style source)
        Copy properties from an existing style.
        Parameters:
        source - style source

      • getParent

        Style getParent()
        Reteur the parent style
        Returns:
        style object
